title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 652/96 of 11 April 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 3016/95 opening Community tariff quotas for 1996 for sheep, goats, sheepmeat and goatmeat falling within CN codes 0104 10 30, 0104 10 80, 0104 20 90 and 0204
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 652/96 of 11 April 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 3016/95 opening Community tariff quotas for 1996 for sheep, goats, sheepmeat and goatmeat falling within CN codes 0104 10 30, 0104 10 80, 0104 20 90 and 0204
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex I of Regulation (EC) No 3016/95 is hereby amended as follows:
- the quantity for Australia is replaced by the quantity '18 650` tonnes,
- the quantity for New Zealand is replaced by the quantity '226 700` tonnes,
- the quantity for Chile is replaced by the quantity '3 000` tonnes,
- the quantity for Iceland is replaced by the quantity '1 350` tonnes.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 April 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 289, 7. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 123, 3. 6. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 334, 30. 12. 1995, p. 38.
(4) OJ No L 334, 30. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 327, 30. 12. 1995, p. 17.
(6) OJ No L 314, 28. 12. 1995, p. 35.
